trans-unit.source: Defines the events relating to <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> 对象相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementing object defines the context on which these events occur.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象定义发生这些事件的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The sender in all events should be the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile> instance related to the event.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有事件的发送方应<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile>与事件相关的实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> instance is added.
trans-unit.target: 在添加新 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> 实例时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IDeployableFile.DeploymentPath" /> property is modified.
trans-unit.target: 在修改 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IDeployableFile.DeploymentPath" /> 属性时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IDeployableFile.DeploymentType" /> property is modified.
trans-unit.target: 在修改 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IDeployableFile.DeploymentType" /> 属性时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> instance is renamed.
trans-unit.target: 在重命名 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> 实例时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> instance is about to be opened.
trans-unit.target: 在即将打开 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> 实例时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value in an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> instance is modified.
trans-unit.target: 在更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> 实例中的属性值时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> instance is removed.
trans-unit.target: 在移除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemFile" /> 实例时发生。
